messages.msgSnippet: Carol in NC, There is a saying (and I cannot remember what author actually said this) which claims that if every subject we teach in schools could be presented
messages.messageBody:
Carol in NC,
There is a saying (and I cannot remember what author actually said this)
which claims that if every subject we teach in schools could be presented
to children in story form, there would be no difficulty learning any
concept, subject, or skill.
I have found this to be true with nearly every child I have worked with,
I'm sure most parents would agree with it as well.

Amy in NY
